hero.title: About Us
hero.p1: At Luumilo, we believe that some of the most important life skills – such as emotional resilience, gratitude and self-care – can best be learned early on, through real experiences and playful interaction.
hero.p2: That's why we've created a platform that helps families introduce these essential values to children aged 3 to 6 through fun, screen-free daily activities.

family.title: Why it matters
family.description: Did you know that 90% of brain development occurs before the 7th year of life? Precisely in these formative years, Luumilo lays the foundation for healthy habits and emotional resilience. This way, children grow up to be self-confident, empathetic, and strong people, with qualities they can build on throughout their lives.

mission.title: Mission
mission.p1: At Luumilo, we help you as a parent to build your child's inner strength at home in a simple and inspiring way.
mission.p2: With our learning platform, you support your child (3–6) in developing resilience, gratitude, self-care and essential life skills – through small, achievable steps that fit into your daily life. Without extra stress and free from screen time.

vision.title: Vision
vision.p1: We believe that children who stand firm in their shoes are ready for the future.
vision.p2: In a world full of stimuli, performance pressure and constant changes, we offer you an accessible, unique and playful method to give your child a strong foundation: with attention and intention, fitting into your family life.
vision.p3: Our goal is to build a more powerful, meaningful beginning together with millions of parents like you in the most important and formative years of your children.

finalCta.title: Come along on the journey!
finalCta.p1: We invite you to discover Luumilo, try out the activities, track your child's progress and enjoy the educational and fun moments you encounter along the way.
finalCta.p2:
Let's build a better future together,
one day, one mission at a time.
